casebody.data:
Pagi Monique LUDWIG, f/k/a Pagi Monique Pillen, Plaintiff-Appellee,
v.
Scott Donald PILLEN, Defendant-Appellant. SC: 156984
COA: 339046 Supreme Court of Michigan. May 1, 2018

Order

On order of the Court, the application for leave to appeal the November 29, 2017 order of the Court of Appeals is considered, and it is DENIED, because we are not persuaded that the questions presented should be reviewed by this Court.
